Detailed Description

template<typename Element, typename Pointer, typename Derived = thrust::use_default>
class thrust::reference< Element, Pointer, Derived >

reference is a wrapped reference to an object stored in memory. reference generalizes device_reference by relaxing the type of pointer associated with the object. reference is the type of the result of dereferencing a tagged pointer-like object such as pointer, and intermediates operations on objects existing in a remote memory.

Template Parameters:
Elementspecifies the type of the referent object.
Pointerspecifies the type of the result of taking the address of reference.
Derivedallows the client to specify the name of the derived type when reference is used as a base class. This is useful to ensure that assignment to objects of the derived type return values of the derived type as a result. By default, this type is reference<Element,Pointer>.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename Element, typename Pointer, typename Derived = thrust::use_default>
__host__ __device__ thrust::reference< Element, Pointer, Derived >::reference ( const pointer &  ptr) [explicit]

This copy constructor initializes this reference to refer to an object pointed to by the given pointer. After this reference is constructed, it shall refer to the object pointed to by ptr.

Parameters:
ptrA pointer to copy from.

Reimplemented in thrust::system::cpp::reference< T >, thrust::system::cuda::reference< T >, thrust::system::omp::reference< T >, and thrust::system::tbb::reference< T >.

template<typename Element, typename Pointer, typename Derived = thrust::use_default>
template<typename OtherElement , typename OtherPointer , typename OtherDerived >
__host__ __device__ thrust::reference< Element, Pointer, Derived >::reference ( const reference< OtherElement, OtherPointer, OtherDerived > &  other,
typename thrust::detail::enable_if_convertible< typename reference< OtherElement, OtherPointer, OtherDerived >::pointer, pointer >::type *  = 0 
)

This copy constructor accepts a const reference to another reference of related type. After this reference is constructed, it shall refer to the same object as other.

Parameters:
otherA reference to copy from.
Template Parameters:
OtherElementthe element type of the other reference.
OtherPointerthe pointer type of the other reference.
OtherDerivedthe derived type of the other reference.
Note:
This constructor is templated primarily to allow initialization of reference<const T,...> from reference<T,...>.

template<typename Element, typename Pointer, typename Derived = thrust::use_default>
__host__ __device__ pointer thrust::reference< Element, Pointer, Derived >::operator& ( ) const

Address-of operator returns a pointer pointing to the object referenced by this reference. It does not return the address of this reference.

Returns:
A pointer pointing to the referenct object.
